timeline.bodyText: I think this should be catching a different type of exception. I think a NoSuchClientException would be more appropriate as that is what us actually thrown in the IridaClientDetailsServiceImpl.java > loadClientByClientId method. This method signature will also need to be updated to include throws NoSuchClientException. What do you think?
timeline.author: deepsidhu85

replies.bodyText: Makes sense to me, updated in d643207
